verses.verse: In the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of our <S%H1546>captivity<s%>, in the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H5221>smitten<s%>, in the <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was upon me, and <S%H935>brought<s%> me thither.

In the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> he me into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H5117>set<s%> me upon a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, by which was as the <S%H4011>frame<s%> of a <S%H5892>city<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%>. by which: or, upon which

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me thither, and, behold, there was a <S%H376>man<s%>, whose <S%H4758>appearance<s%> was like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, with a <S%H6616>line<s%> of <S%H6593>flax<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>; and he <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7200>behold<s%> with thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with thine <S%H241>ears<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> upon all that I shall <S%H7200>shew<s%> thee; for to the <S%H4616>intent<s%> that I might <S%H7200>shew<s%> them unto thee art thou <S%H935>brought<s%> hither: <S%H5046>declare<s%> all that thou <S%H7200>seest<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And behold a <S%H2346>wall<s%> on the <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and in the <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> of <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> long by the <S%H520>cubit<s%> and an hand <S%H2948>breadth<s%>: so he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H1146>building<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>; and the <S%H6967>height<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> he unto the <S%H8179>gate<s%> which <S%H6440>looketh<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H4609>stairs<s%> thereof, and <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, which was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>; and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the gate, which was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>. which looketh: Heb. whose face was the way toward the east

And every little <S%H8372>chamber<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H753>long<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>; and between the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>.
He <S%H4058>measured<s%> also the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>.

Then <S%H4058>measured<s%> he the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> was <S%H1004>inward<s%>.
